message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this unique product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $900000. This is a fair price considering its value and rarity.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but my budget allows me to only spend up to $850000. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both the value of the product and my financial limits.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to compromise on the value of the product. Considering its rarity and uniqueness, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $875000. This is a fair price that balances the value of the product with your budget.
